subject: PE Today: Shouting At The Pope
body:
CBSNews.com












The 
      Public Eye Chat With ... Richard Roth (Part I)"So that day I stood outside the church 
      where the Pope was making his parish visit, and when he came out I 
      shouted 'Your holiness, what do 
      you think of what’s happening in Poland?' The crowd of parishioners and the 
      Pope’s security detail were stunned. I don’t think they’d ever had a 
      reporter shout a question at the Pope, let alone a question in English to 
      the Polish Pope in Rome." [+ Read More]

Johnston 
      Release: What's Behind It?It's impossible to tell exactly 
      how genuine Alan Johnston's 
      praise of Hamas ultimately is. He could be completely sincere in his 
      praising of the group that engineered his release. He also may be going 
      out of his way to compliment the group because doing so was a condition of 
      his release.[+ Read More]
